mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, P.USER_ID USER_ID, M.P_IMG USER_P_IMG, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(POSTING_TIME, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI') "POSTING_TIME", IMG_FILE, P.STATUS STATUS FROM POST P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_ID = M.USER_ID AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY POST_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST VALUES (SEQ_POST_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPfImg}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, #{imgFile}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, P.USER_ID USER_ID, M.P_IMG USER_P_IMG, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(POSTING_TIME, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI') "POSTING_TIME", IMG_FILE, P.STATUS STATUS FROM POST P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_ID = M.USER_ID AND POST_ID = #{postId} AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * From POST P JOIN SAVE_LIST S ON P.POST_ID = S.SAVED_POST_ID WHERE S.user_id=#{userId}
